description: These leather boots are perfect for mountain tours, hikes and via ferrata. The Vibram outsole provides excellent grip with low weight. The hard-wearing upper material is made from sustainable terracare® leather from Germany and a PFC-free Durable Water Repellent finish that keeps your feet dry. The Kento Advanced High GTX is super breathable, for continued comfort even after you put your feet up in your cabin.
name: Mammut Kento Advanced High GTX - Mens
